Contact Information

  • City of Stanton P O Box 370, Stanton TX 79782-0370
  • Main Number:
    432-756-3301
  • Water Department:
    432-756-3302
  • Police Department:
    432-756-3303
  • For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the Martin County Sheriff Office
    (432-756-3336)     to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.
  • cityofstantontx@gmail.com
  • The City of Stanton Attorney Paige Skehan Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
  • Our offices are open from Monday - Friday 8:00 am to 5:00 pm The offices are closed on most holidays.
